[Semantic Field] Implement the search analyzer support for semantic field at semantic field index creation time.

Implement analyzer based neural sparse query ( )

Support custom weights in RRF normalization processor

Apply mask operation in preindex to optimize derived source

Buffer for special characters

Add space type mapping for pre-trained embedding models, add new additional\_config field and BaseModelConfig class
Support customized message endpoint and addressing comments
Add custom SSE endpoint for the MCP Client
Expose Update Agent API
Use function calling for existing LLM interfaces

Metrics framework integration with ml-commons

For inline model connector name isn't required
Fix the tutorial in AIConnectorHelper when fetching domain\_url
Adds Json Parsing to nested object during update Query step in ML Inference Request processor
Adding / as a valid character
Quick fix for guava noclass issue
Fix python client not able to connect to MCP server issue
Excluding circuit breaker for Agent
Adding tenantId to the connector executor when this is inline connector
